title: Seeker's Armguard stack
body: When you sell Seeker's Armguard with some stack and undo sell - stack is not recovered.

replies.body: Rip same thing with a completed {{item:1083}} except you get something like 250ish stacks and still get 0 gold for trying to  complete a already completed item. Prob also works for {{item:3052}} {{item:3004}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3048}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3003}}
